name: ORS Reportable Incidents Distribution Report
description:
This report provides detailed information on a particular incident and the prisoners who were involved; it is driven by a prompt on Incident Number.
INC0013 - v00.00.09 Last Modified: 15/08/13

dataset.name: Incident Details
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID AS INCIDENT_CASE_ID, AT_INCID_LOC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INCIDENT_DATE, AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_TIME AS INCIDENT_TIME, AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.DESCRIPTION AS INCIDENT_TYPE, AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_DETAILS AS INCIDENT_DETAILS, AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION AS INCIDENT_QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.QUE_SEQ AS QUE_SEQ, AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWERS.DESCRIPTION AS INCIDENT_ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT AS RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_INCID_LOC, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.QUESTIONNAIRES AT_QUESTIONNAIRES, OMS_OWNER.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS, OMS_OWNER.QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWERS AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWERS, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.INCIDENT_CASE_ID AND AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.QUESTION_SEQ = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_SEQ) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUE_ID = AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.QUESTIONNAIRE_ANS_ID = AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_ANSWERS.QUESTIONNAIRE_ANS_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_TYPE = AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.CODE) AND (AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.QUESTIONNAIRE_CATEGORY = ('IR_TYPE')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_INCID_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT INCIDENT_CASE_ID, DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_DATE, INCIDENT_TIME, INCIDENT_TYPE, INCIDENT_DETAILS, INCIDENT_QUESTION_DESCRIPTION, QUE_SEQ, INCIDENT_ANSWER_DESCRIPTION, RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, TRIM((AT_OFFENDER.TITLE) || ' ' || (AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME) || ' ' || (AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME)) AS FULL_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.BIRTH_DATE AS BIRTH_DATE, AT_OFFENDER.SEX_CODE AS SEX_CODE, AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK.STATUS_2 AS STATUS_2, AT_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS.DESCRIPTION AS MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, AT_REF_COD_INCD_ROL.DESCRIPTION AS INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE, AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER AS IDENTIFIER, AT_OFFENDER_CRO.IDENTIFIER AS CRO_NUMBER FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ETHNICITY_DESC, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_REF_COD_INCD_ROL, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IDENTIFIERS AT_OFFENDER_PNC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IDENTIFIERS AT_OFFENDER_CRO, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_REF_COD_INCD_ROL.DOMAIN = ('IR_OFF_PART') OR AT_REF_COD_INCD_ROL.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.PARTICIPATION_ROLE = AT_REF_COD_INCD_ROL.CODE (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.DOMAIN (+) = 'ETHNICITY') AND (AT_ETHNICITY_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER.RACE_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = OMS_OWNER.V_HEADER_BLOCK.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISONMENT_STATUS) AND (AT_MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS.DOMAIN (+) = 'IMP_STS') AND (AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISON_STATUS_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(a.imprison_status_seq) FROM OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES a WHERE a.offender_book_id = AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID GROUP BY a.offender_book_id) OR AT_OFFENDER_IMPRISON_STATUSES.IMPRISON_STATUS_SEQ IS NULL) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CRO.IDENTIFIER_TYPE = 'CRO') AND (AT_OFFENDER_CRO.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.IDENTIFIER_TYPE = 'PNC') AND (AT_OFFENDER_PNC.OFFENDER_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP' AND AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.STAFF_ID IS NULL)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, SEX_CODE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS_2, MAIN_LEGAL_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, INCIDENT_PARTICIPATION_ROLE, IDENTIFIER, CRO_NUMBER FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.REFERENCE_CODES AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_ALERTS AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE) AND (AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN = 'ALERT_CODE' OR AT_ALERT_TYPE_DESC.DOMAIN IS NULL) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP' AND AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_CODE IN ('HA', 'XEL', 'V45', 'V46', 'VOP', 'VJOP') AND AT_OFFENDER_ALERTS.ALERT_STATUS = 'ACTIVE')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Sentence
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.LAST_REL_DATE AS LAST_REL_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH AS EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, DT_DEMGR_SENT_DATE.SENTENCE_DATE AS SENTENCE_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID /* Release Date start */, CASE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ARD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CRD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.NPD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.HDCAD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.APD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.PRRD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.MTD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.ETD_CALCULATED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_OVERRIDED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_OVERRIDED_DATE WHEN NOT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_CALCULATED_DATE IS NULL THEN AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.LTD_CALCULATED_DATE ELSE NULL END AS Last_Rel_Date /* Release Date end */, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CALCULATION_DATE) IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MAX(AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CALCULATION_DATE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) /* End of 'LAST_RELEASE_DATE'. 10th NOv 2008 . Based on the highest 'Offender Sent Calculation Id' */) DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, COURT_DATE AS Sentence_Date FROM ORDERS WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, COURT_DATE) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MIN(COURT_DATE) FROM ORDERS GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND ORDER_TYPE = ('AUTO') /* End of code for 'Sentence Date. */) DT_DEMGR_SENT_DATE, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_LAST_RELEASE_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (DT_DEMGR_SENT_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP' AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.CALCULATION_DATE = (SELECT MAX(A.CALCULATION_DATE) FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS A WHERE AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = A.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) OR AT_OFFENDER_SENT_CALCULATIONS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID IS NULL /* END Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */) /* START Filter: Hierarchies/Sentence/Sentence Dates/Other Sentence Dates/''Latest Calculation Date'' */)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LAST_REL_DATE, EFFECTIVE_SENTENCE_LENGTH, SENTENCE_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Housing
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATIONS AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.LIVING_UNIT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.INTERNAL_LOCATION_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INTERNAL_LOCATION_L4.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_WING_ESTABLISHMENT.AGY_LOC_ID = WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.CASELOAD_ID) AND (WING_CASELOAD_SECURITY.USERNAME = UPPER('JHARGREAVES')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Reception
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DT_RECEPTION_DATE.MOVEMENT_DATE AS MOVEMENT_DATE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS, (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME FROM OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS WHERE (OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MOVEMENT_DATE, MOVEMENT_TIME) IN (SELECT OFFENDER_BOOK_ID, MIN(MOVEMENT_DATE), MIN(MOVEMENT_TIME) FROM OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS GROUP BY OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND DIRECTION_CODE = ('IN') /* Reception Date. End of object10 Nov 2008. First movement with direction IN. Screen:Enquiries/Offender Specifics/External Moves -->Date */) DT_RECEPTION_DATE, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_EXTERNAL_MOVEMENTS.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = DT_RECEPTION_DATE.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, MOVEMENT_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Offences
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFNCS_DEMG_NO_OFF.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, COUNT(AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.STATUTE_CODE || AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.OFFENCE_CODE) AS NUMBER_OF_OFFENCES FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENCES AT_OFFNCS_DEMG_NO_OFF, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CHARGES AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF WHERE (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.CHARGE_STATUS = ('A') OR AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.CHARGE_STATUS IS NULL) AND (AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.STATUTE_CODE = AT_OFFNCS_DEMG_NO_OFF.STATUTE_CODE AND AT_OFF_CHARGS_DEMG_NO_OFF.OFFENCE_CODE = AT_OFFNCS_DEMG_NO_OFF.OFFENCE_CODE) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP'))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFNCS_DEMG_NO_OFF.DESCRIPTION), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION, NUMBER_OF_OFFENCES FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Nationality
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY AS OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_NATIONALITY.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_PROFILE_DETAILS AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT, OMS_OWNER.PROFILE_CODES AT_NATIONALITY, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+)) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_PARTIES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE = ('NAT') OR AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE IS NULL) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_TYPE AND AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_CODE = AT_OFF_PROF_DET_NAT.PROFILE_CODE) AND (AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE = ('NAT') OR AT_NATIONALITY.PROFILE_TYPE IS NULL) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = 1000 AND AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_STATUS <> 'DUP')), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)
